import { PillsImage } from "/src/components/Images";


# Pills
Pills allow user to turn an option on or off just like checkbox.

<div style={{backgroundColor: 'white',border: '1px solid #F4F6F8', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
   <PillsImage />
</div>

### Default Pill

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.PillAV
	android:layout_width="wrap_content"
	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
	app:text="Pills Default" />
```
<br/><br/>

### Pill with icon

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.PillAV
	android:layout_width="wrap_content"
	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
	app:icon="@drawable/{your_drawable}"
	app:text="Pills Default Icon" />
```
<br/><br/>

### Action

```kotlin
pills.setOnCheckedChangeListener {
	// you can access 'it' which will return state of the pill (selected true/false)
	// your code here
}
```
